summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for implementation during the period October 1, 1976 through December 31, 1976, of projects identified in the City's 1976 Criminal Justice Plan; authorizing certain grant contracts, establishing in the Police Department one Program Coordinator III position, two Program Coordinator I positions, and one Police Officer, Detective position, abrogating one Clerk Typist II position in the Police Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the Emergency therefor.
committee: Human Resources and Jud. and Public Safety and Justice
